remarks: Cancellation law for subtraction.  Deduction form of ~ subcan2 . Generalization of ~ subcan2d .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
negidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
pncand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subaddd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subcan2ad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - C ) = ( B - C ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
